mapper.select:
SELECT NOTICE_ID, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(VHC_NO SEPARATOR ',') FROM BMS_VHC_MST WHERE VHC_ID IN (SELECT VHC_ID FROM BMS_NOTICE_VHC_CMPSTN NV WHERE NV.NOTICE_ID = N.NOTICE_ID)) VHC_NO, TITLE, SEND_DIV, SEND_STS, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DTM, '%Y%m%d%H%i') REG_DTM, DATE_FORMAT(RSV_DTM, '%Y%m%d%H%i') RSV_DTM, DATE_FORMAT(SEND_DTM, '%Y%m%d%H%i') SEND_DTM, DATE_FORMAT(UPD_DTM, '%Y%m%d%H%i') UPD_DTM, CONTENTS, UPD_ID FROM BMS_NOTICE_MST N
NOTICE_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') OR TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')

SELECT VHC_ID, VHC_NO, CHAS_NO, COMP_NM, V.AREA FROM BMS_VHC_MST V, BMS_TRANSCOMP_MST T WHERE V.COMP_ID = T.COMP_ID
AND (VHC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%'))
AND VHC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
ORDER BY VHC_ID

SELECT STTN_ID, STTN_NM, STTN_NO, GPS_X, GPS_Y FROM BMS_STTN_MST
WHERE DEL_YN!='Y'
AND STTN_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || STTN_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND STTN_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND STTN_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
ORDER BY STTN_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BMS_NOTICE_MST(NOTICE_ID, TITLE, SEND_DIV, SEND_STS, REG_DTM, RSV_DTM, SEND_DTM, UPD_DTM, CONTENTS, UPD_ID) VALUES (#{NOTICE_ID}, #{TITLE}, #{SEND_DIV}, #{SEND_STS}, STR_TO_DATE(#{REG_DTM}, '%Y%m%d%H%i'), STR_TO_DATE(#{RSV_DTM}, '%Y%m%d%H%i'), STR_TO_DATE(#{SEND_DTM}, '%Y%m%d%H%i'), #{UPD_DTM}, #{CONTENTS}, #{UPD_ID})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BMS_NOTICE_VHC_CMPSTN WHERE NOTICE_ID = #{NOTICE_ID} AND VHC_ID = #{VHC_ID}
DELETE FROM BMS_NOTICE_STTN_CMPSTN WHERE NOTICE_ID = #{NOTICE_ID} AND STTN_ID = #{STTN_ID}
